story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_0200:
Hilbert, you guys go ahead! We’ll keep them
busy here!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_0300: I’ll help you as well, Hilda!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_0400:
I think it would be more efficient to do what
Hilda said.
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_0600: Hilda, Rosa! Be careful, you two!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_0900:
It’s bold of you to come this far. Seems like you
don’t know your place!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1000:
This place is near our main base, and we’re
gonna take you down with strength and numbers!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1100: Don’t think you can beat us with just strength!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1200:
We care for our Pokémon and the people around
us! And that makes us way stronger than you!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1300:
We wanna help our friends, and we feel that
deep in our hearts!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1400: That’s why we won’t lose to the likes of you!
story_teamplasma_01_13000/2401_1001_1600:
Once we finish with you two, we’ll go after the
ones that went ahead!
